title: Rain Shadow
description: Rain Shadow Book 4 of 5-- books should be read in order.  Dreygon Sharpe is more determined than ever to get Angel back to the Bedlam MC compound. Even if it means killing a few people along the way. Luke is willing to risk anything to keep Angel safe. And he soon discovers that sometimes rather than trying to outrun a madman, it's easier just to face him head on.  The Barringer Brothers Series Approximately 40,000 words.
author: Tess Oliver
